basicInfo.name: Biscuit
basicInfo.flavor: Big hammers and scorching heat. Despite the inherent dangers and challenges of blacksmithing, Biscuit remains unharmed, as if she is favored by the flames.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack plus 60% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Damage Reduction [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 6% Damage Reduction. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Skill 1.name: Equipment Enhancement
Skill 1.desc:
Ally with the Highest Attack
 - Grants Boss Damage Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Weakness Hit Chance Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Boss Damage Boost to 40%.
 - Increases Effect: Weakness Hit Chance Boost to 54%.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Changes Number of Targets: To 2 Allies with the highest Attack.

Skill 2.name: Leap Attack
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack plus 115% of Defense 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 115% of Magic Attack plus 135% of Defense.

Passive.name: Blacksmith's Enhancement
Passive.desc:
All Enemies
 - Inflicts Defense Reduction. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 24%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - All Allies
 - Adds Effect: 20% Quintuple-Target Attack Resistance. [Always Active]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Hammer, anvil, smithy, dad, fire, Chancellor, material that can be made into quality equipment
profile.story: Big hammers and scorching heat. Despite the inherent dangers and challenges of blacksmithing, Biscuit remains unharmed, as if she is favored by the flames.

basicInfo.name: Biscuit
basicInfo.flavor: Biscuit's weapons and armor proved so effective that they were adopted as standard issue weapons for the Terra Kingdom army. She has since been dubbed the Blacksmith of the Kingdom, and has become the envy of other smiths.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Magic Attack plus 55% of Defense 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 55% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Equipment Enhancement
Skill 1.desc:
Ally with the Highest Attack
 - Grants Boss Damage Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Weakness Hit Chance Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Weakness Hit Chance Boost to 34%.

Skill 2.name: Leap Attack
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack plus 100% of Defense 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 100% of Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Blacksmith's Enhancement
Passive.desc:
All Enemies
 - Inflicts Defense Reduction. [Always Active]

profile.likes: Hammer, anvil, smithy, dad, fire, Chancellor, material that can be made into quality equipment
profile.story: Biscuit's weapons and armor proved so effective that they were adopted as standard issue weapons for the Terra Kingdom army. She has since been dubbed the Blacksmith of the Kingdom, and has become the envy of other smiths.

basicInfo.name: Biscuit
basicInfo.flavor: Taking her father's place in the smithy, she found solace in the rhythm of the hammer and anvil, which soon became her steadfast companions.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Magic Attack plus 50% of Defense 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 40% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Equipment Enhancement
Skill 1.desc:
Ally with the Highest Attack
 - Grants Boss Damage Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Weakness Hit Chance Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Weakness Hit Chance Boost to 25%.

Skill 2.name: Leap Attack
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack plus 95% of Defense 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 95% of Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Blacksmith's Enhancement
Passive.desc:
All Enemies
 - Inflicts Defense Reduction. [Always Active]
